image_2.description: Kharkiv, Ukraine's second-largest city, has experienced a deadly rocket assault, including the use of internationally banned cluster munitions, resulting in civilian casualties. The bombardment has raised alarms about the extent of the Kremlin's willingness to subjugate Ukraine.
